Articles.Content:
Howdy I'm Flowey I'm Will, algo known as NAILED IT! Because when I land somewhere my ship falls to pieces when I land but IT DOESN'T MATTER!

I arrived to this website to mod some mods (MODINCEPTION) such as Sylandro's Planet Warehouse (all credit to Sylandro)

But I'm here to learn too. I want to know how to make my own planets and especially the big, bugy gas giants.

So, If you feel kind and want to teach, I'll be glad to read yogur lessons

(It's already over?) So this is my presentation to the Kerbal Space Program website.

Hello Nailed It! and welcome to the forum!

We have a very active and engaged modding community around here.  And the forum users have an immense amount to teach an interested party.

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
